author: mariadalfonso
body:
This PR add a functionality to the Mahi on GPU that take into account the HcalChannelQuality to resynch with what is done on CPU

On CPU the rechit is dropped, while for the GPU energy is set to 0.
Tested on Run3 MC, and disable the ieta=18, depth1. (Those channel are present only at DIGI, but the finer is not connected to the scintillator, so energy is not meaningful.)

Some help in solving some differences observed between the Run3 HLT menu

@fwyzard @abdoulline
title: HBHEGPU: added taggedBadByDb by ChannelQuality in GPU
